divs: sighting detailsit was about 11:30pm and a saturday night in the begining of july, 2008. i was going to the bathroom, standing at the toilet, in the second floor bathroom. a bright light took the corner of my left eye. turning to my left, i looked out the window, which looks out onto acres of cornfields, and saw the most intense white round light imaginable. it pulsated\shimmed so badly and itensely that it actually kind of hurt my eyes and almost made me turn my eyes away. it seemed to "shuttle" up and down a little, and the light began getting larger\closer. i ran down the hall and woke my fiance and we ran back into bathroom and i showed her the light as well. as we could see it was getting closer to the back of the house, i said let's go down onto the deck and see if we can see it. we ran out onto the deck and in the couple seconds it took us to run down the stairs and out the back door, it was already hovering almost directly over head. the object was triangle\boomerang shaped and had three white lights on its surface - one light on each "tip" of the triangle\boomerang. i heard very low, quiet "hum" and looked up at the object. in a fraction of second - they object jetted over our heads and over the house and out of sight. i do not have any physical evidence of the sighting, and wish i would have known that this organization existed when i witness this sighting. i contimplated calling 911, but was unsure if i would have been "misusing" the 911 service. i happened upon the segment about the bucks county, pa 2008 flap, was instantly moved to account my sighting.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Noticed one intense round pulsating white light from 2nd floor window, coming toward house and decending - ran out onto deck and object was over head in sky with three white lights on surface - shape like boomerang - hovered then took off over top of hous
